title: Swan song = Jue xiang
creator_credit: Pearl River Film Studio and Zhang Zeming
brief_description: A simple, moving, and allegorical story of an ageing composer of traditional Cantonese music. His harried later years are a reflection of the political vicissitudes of New China. Mandarin and Cantonese dialogue with English subtitles.
creator_credit_for_label: Pearl River Film Studio and Zhang Zeming
